# ChipFlow

> ChipFlow is an open-source platform for designing, testing, and manufacturing
> custom silicon using Python and the Amaranth HDL. This documentation covers
> the ChipFlow library, Digital IP library, Amaranth language, and Amaranth SoC toolkit.


2022, ChipFlow

## Pages

- [chipflow.platform](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/index.html.md): Platform definitions for ChipFlow.
- [chipflow.packages](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packages/index.html.md): Package definitions for ChipFlow platforms.
- [chipflow.packaging](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/index.html.md): Package definitions and pin allocation.
- [chipflow.utils](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/utils/index.html.md): Core utility functions for ChipFlow
- [chipflow.config](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/config/index.html.md): Configuration management for ChipFlow.
- [chipflow.common](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/common/index.html.md): Common utilities for ChipFlow.
- [chipflow.auth](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/auth/index.html.md): ChipFlow authentication helper module.
- [chipflow.auth_command](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/auth_command/index.html.md): ChipFlow authentication command for CLI.
- [chipflow.config.parser](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/config/parser/index.html.md): Configuration file parsing and utilities.
- [chipflow.packaging.allocation](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/allocation/index.html.md): Pin allocation algorithms for package definitions.
- [chipflow.packaging.standard](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/standard/index.html.md): Standard package definitions for common package types.
- [chipflow.packaging.port_desc](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/port_desc/index.html.md): Port description models for pin allocation.
- [chipflow.packaging.utils](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/utils/index.html.md): Utility functions for package and pin lock management.
- [chipflow.packaging.commands](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/commands/index.html.md): CLI commands for pin lock management.
- [chipflow.packaging.openframe](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/openframe/index.html.md): Openframe package definition.
- [chipflow.packaging.pins](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/pins/index.html.md): Pin dataclasses and types for package definitions.
- [chipflow.packaging.grid_array](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/grid_array/index.html.md): Grid array package definitions.
- [chipflow.packaging.lockfile](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/lockfile/index.html.md): Lock file models for pin assignments.
- [chipflow.packaging.base](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/packaging/base/index.html.md): Base classes for package definitions.
- [chipflow.platform.io](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/io/index.html.md): IO signatures and utilities for ChipFlow platforms.
- [chipflow.platform.base](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/base/index.html.md): Base classes and utilities for ChipFlow platform steps.
- [chipflow.platform.io.signatures](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/io/signatures/index.html.md): Common interface signatures for ChipFlow platforms.
- [chipflow.platform.io.iosignature](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/io/iosignature/index.html.md): IO signature definitions for ChipFlow platforms.
- [chipflow.platform.io.sky130](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/io/sky130/index.html.md): Sky130-specific IO definitions.
- [chipflow.platform.io.annotate](chipflow-lib/autoapi/chipflow/platform/io/annotate/index.html.md): Amaranth annotation utilities for ChipFlow.
